description: Develops expertise in server side engineering

signals: Ensures team engagement by incorporating ideas from the team
Mentorship - ability to successfully transfer knowledge --> Mentorship - you ensure knowledge transfer is happening in your team and there's no bus factor
Mentorship - you foster a mentorship culture, where the ICs in the team are empowered and engaged in giving each other support
Able to handle pressure
Able to grow and retain a strong team
You are a humble leader, you are not afraid to escalate and ask for help from you manager/peers/people you manage
You are a servent leader, you act as the voice of your team, represent them and their needs and you take care of their well-being
examples: Grows the team and ensures smooth hiring and onboarding process
Helps team members to improve with feedback and development plans
Analyses and improves team productivity based on KPIs

Stakeholder management --> You maintain good relationship with your stakeholders based on mutual respect for example: You effectivly communicate with you stakeholders, keeping them in the loop and mitigate issues using transaprancy and open communication
Pragmatism, enabling a culture focused on delivering solutions --> You foster a culture focused on delivering solutions and pragmatism

signals: Fosters collaboration and knowledge sharing between teams
Able to inspire others -->You inspire others, You are a role model to ICs wanting to grow in M track and a role model to M1s in the org

High cultural awareness --> You understand what is the culture that your team needs to get the job done and you interativly adjust your culture using positive reinfrocmenets, hiring the right people that fit and improves the culture
Able to attract strong talent and spot & proactively retain high performers
Fosters an open and inclusive culture
Able to communicate efficiently, including conflict resolution, across stakeholders and teams
Leads by example
examples: Builds and improves strong relationships with engineers and managers across the organization as well as relevant business stakeholders for several teams; leverages relationships to better plan for and position teams
Jumps in to help when critical incidents happen even though not on-call
Proactivley improving operation excellence by recommeding initiaves and simplifcations
You foster a mentorship culture where other Ms in the team are empopwered and enaged in giving each other support
You support and help grow other managers in the team, sharing best practices and being a role model

signals: Ability to communicate and present to stakeholders from different departments
Strong business acumen
examples: Strategic thinking --> Strategic thinking : Sets technical objectives to the teams / managers to make sure DH business growth/potential can be supported by the tech side

signals: Takes ownership of decisions made in the organization
Strategic thinking -->  Strategic thinking : You can read the market trends and understand forecoming business requierments and implementing required orgnizational teams to fullfuill them
Strategic thinking -->  Strategic thinking : Recognizes product opportunities and differentiators in relation to the competition
Facilitation skills
Influencing skills
Empowers team
Knows where to deep dive and where to delegate
examples: Sets department strategy in alignment with M5/CTO
Constantly raises quality of recruiting processes and talent quality

signals: Drive for maximizing impact
